site_name: Land Rear Of Tiffany Court 67 Oakhurst GroveLondonSouthwark
description: Non-material amendments to planning permission ref 19/AP/0611 dated 14/11/2019 for Construction of 4 no. three storey residential dwellings with associated amenity spaces, bin storage and cycle storage.Non-material amendments in this application consist of Alterations to the openings on the front elevation and return of bay windowsAlterations to the rear elevation openings at ground floorAlterations to internal layout of dwellings Alterations to bins storage include replacement of separate to communal bins storage to be located between pair of dwellings and communal bins storage strategyAlterations to front gates opening directionAddition of skylights to rear part of the roof Slight repositioning of bike lockers Details of these changes are set out in additional information submitted.    Non-material amendment for the revision to openings at the front and rear elevation and the return of bay window. Alterations to the internal layout of dwellings and to amend the bin storage strategy of planning permission LBS reg no 19/AP/0611 for the construction of 4 no. three storey residential dwellings with associated amenity spaces, bin storage and cycle storage.
